headline: Why this expert says banks are 'undervalued'
summary: Financials (XLF) are underperforming so far this year, but many investors are still optimistic about the sector. Commerce Street Holdings CEO Dory Wiley sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain why he's bullish on the financial sector, especially banks and regional banks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Why this expert says banks are 'undervalued'
